resources.string: Hey! I didn\'t implement this yet

" Welcome to Music Friend! Hopefully you\'re not bored yet.
Yeah, the list is currently just listing Satriani albums using the iTunes API. It does not play music and you can\'t download to listen offline or create playlists.
But hey, at least it does not crash (does it?) :D
This app was written by Bengt Hammarlund and it\'s code it\'s available at github."
